{{Description|Jean's magnanimity is as vast as the dandelion fields, and it is the root of her wish to protect others.}}
'''Dandelion Breeze''' is [[Jean]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|energy frame|46}}
* The Dandelion Field lasts for '''10''' seconds.
* The Dandelion Field will heal active characters within it and apply {{Anemo}} to them once every second for a total of '''10''' times.
* [[Swirl]] reactions triggered by the self-applied Anemo are able to trigger the 4-Piece effect of the [[Viridescent Venerer]] Artifact Set. However, it does not trigger any other reaction-related effects, such as the 4-Piece effect of the [[Instructor]] Artifact Set.
* All enemies within the field's AoE will take one instance of Entering/Exiting DMG when the field is created and when it dissipates.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|character=Jean|talent=Dandelion Breeze|ascension|2|Let the Wind Lead}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{Talent Note|constellation|3|When the West Wind Arises}}
*{{Talent Note|constellation|4|Lands of Dandelion}}
*{{Talent Note|constellation|6|Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt}}

==Trivia==
* {{Talent Note|clap}}
* While wearing her default outfit, [[Favonian Devotion]], or her alternate outfit, [[Gunnhildr's Legacy]], when Jean's Elemental Burst is ready, the green gem on her collar and the two green gems on her belt will glow along with her Vision.
* The Dandelion Field marks a falcon symbol on the ground, which could be a reference to [[Vennessa]].
